title: Uru-Shop
desc: e-commerce store created with React and Redux on a team of 4 developers. Styled using Material-UI and styled-components. Used Travis for CI and Jest for testing. I was responsible for Product Overview Component as seen in the image.

title: Build-a-Bogo
desc: e-commerce store written in React and Redux, with serverless backend. I added Google Analytics to the application and an AWS Lambda function to calculate sales tax for the Stripe order. Upvote us on Product Hunt!

title: Todos
desc: Todo Application using Facebook Login API to persist data on Mongo Atlas DB. Also using localstorage to persist across browser sessions.

title: Triva
desc: Trivia game using React and a third party API. Employing browsers' localstorage API to store recent scores on the client.

title: Spear-QA
desc: Microservice for the questions and answers part of the Uru-Shop backend. Deployed across AWS EC2s with Docker Swarm. Used Express for application layer, PostgreSQL for data layer and Redis for caching.

title: Twiddler
desc: Twitter clone created with just jQuery, vanilla Javascript and CSS. Random tweets are generated from a Javascript script on the client side.

title: Crypto Chart
desc: Chart displaying Bitcoin's average daily price over the last 30 days. Powered by Coindesk.

title: Minesweeper
desc: Responsive 10x10 minesweeper board with React and Redux. Redux Sagas are used to trigger square checks adjacent to clicked square.

title: Github Fetcher
desc: Allows user to fetch top Github repos sorted by stargazer count. Users can delete a repo by clicking on the garbage icon. Data persists on a MongoDB database and is globally viewable.
